description.value:
Requirements You know the conflict that created a specific siege shard, and the siege shard is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Immobilized].

You touch the siege shard, establish a mental connection, and relay facts of the conflict's resolution.

Attempt a check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge] about the conflict that created the shard, using the siege shard's Will DC. If you succeed, you prove the conflict's end, and the siege shard reverts to ordinary stone. On a critical failure, images of the past conflict overwhelm you, and you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Confused] until the end of your next turn.

source.value: Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace
